feature1.explanation: Both texts use informal language and similar punctuation styles with the use of colons and informal expressions.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar choice of words and grammatical structures, using informal language and expressions.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are short and direct, with a focus on expressing strong opinions.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a similar tone of frustration and informal style, indicating a common writing style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were identified in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the high consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is fairly high.
